oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement for Memphis parks
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parks; Overton Park; Davis Park; Gaston Park; Guthrie Park; Winchester Park; Memphis Park Commission; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Includes text and thumbnail images of various Memphis parks. -- "Where Memphians Spend Their Leisure Moments" -- "Welcome Entrance to Overton Park" -- "Pony Track and Children's Circus in Overton Park" -- "keeping cool at Davis Park and Playgrounds" -- "Gaston Community Center in Gaston Park" -- "Early riders on Bridle Path" -- "Night Soft Ball Games at Guthrie Park" -- "City's oldest cemetery now a Children's Playground - Winchester Park" -- "10 miles of Bridle Paths wind thru Leafy Parkways"
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo; text with thumbnail images; 7.5 x 9.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
